title: Respect for Our Elders Day
context: [ยง8-9] Respect for Our Elders Day. The third Sunday of October shall be known and recognized as &ldquo;Respect for Our Elders Day&rdquo; during which our elders may be honored with appropriate displays, celebrations, and ceremonies. Respect for Our Elders Day shall not be taken as a state holiday. [L 1986, c 15, ยง1]
